title: Quarkus extensions for Chatbot Platform "EDDI"

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

Interested in this extension, please +1 via the emoji/reaction feature of GitHub (top right).

--
We have recently released version 5 of our open source chatbot platform EDDI which has been migrated to quarkus. 
Announcement article: https://eddi.labs.ai/cloud-native-chatbot-engine-goes-quarkus/
Github Repo: https://github.com/labsai/eddi

Moving on, we would like to build two extensions making EDDI easily available for other quarkus developers looking for (state-based) conversational (chatbot) capabilities.
The two extensions:
* eddi-client (acts as a client-library connecting to an eddi-server instance)
* eddi-server (spin up an eddi instance within another quarkus application, [and possibly extend it])

### Configuration suggestion

_No response_

### Additional context

We have set ourselves the goal of becoming the go-to framework for adding conversational/NLP capabilities to other quarkus apps being build out there. Any feedback or suggestions for improvements of whatever parts of our project are welcomed!
